Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 4 Āsavagocchaka, Kusalattika » 4.2 Sāsavaduka, Kusalattika » 4.2.1 Kusalapada » 4.2.1.7 Pañhāvāra
Hetu
Āsavagocchaka, Kusalattika
Sāsavaduka, Kusalattika
Kusalapada
Pañhāvāra
Hetu
12.
1608Sāsavo kusalo dhammo sāsavassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
1609Anāsavo kusalo dhammo anāsavassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
13.
1610Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve…pe…  nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, āsevane dve…pe…  avigate dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1611(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
